rankingNote: In ranking these programs, priority was given to the generosity and availability of scholarships (full funding opportunities like DAAD, ESOP, MEXT, NUS Research or CSC were rated highly), followed by global reputation based on QS rankings, the fit and breadth of CS curricula offered, and an estimated likelihood of admission. Institutions with higher acceptance rates or transparent statistics were ranked favourably over highly selective programs with limited places.
